articles.title: Brianna McNeal, Olympic 100m hurdles champion, could face eight-year ban - The Guardian
articles.description: The 29-year-old Rio gold medallist, who served a one-year ban for a whereabouts violation, has been charged with ‘tampering with the results management process’ by the Athletics Integrity Unit
articles.content:
The Olympic 100m hurdles champion, Brianna McNeal, could face an eight-year ban after becoming the latest big-name athlete to be charged with an anti-doping violation.
